about_the_game:
Darkwoulfe's Token Pack volume 21


Created by Riley D. Owens (aka Darkwoulfe), this product consists of 57 top-down uniquely designed, 3d rendered tokens, depicting heroes, villains and monsters. You can use these to replace the letter tokens or built-in tokens in many popular adventure modules. Just unlock the encounters and drag these over top or drag them over top of the listing in your combat tracker.

This Token Pack includes:

  • Lawman with Revolver
  • Rancher with Two Guns
  • Skully Shooting
  • Tiny Down
  • Tiny Fighting
  • Tiny Riding
  • Tiny with Pistol
  • Tiny with Rifle
  • Tiny
  • Union Officer Dead
  • Union Officer Riding
  • Union Officer with Pistol
  • Union Officer
  • Union Outlaw
  • Union Soldier Dead
  • Union Soldier Down
  • Union Soldier Fighting
  • Union Soldier Kneeling with Rifle
  • Union Soldier Riding
  • Union Soldier with Pistol
  • Union Soldier with Rifle
  • Union Soldier
  • Warrior with Ponytail
  • Warrior with Rifle
  • Western Hero Bounty Hunter Dead
  • Western Hero Bounty Hunter Fighting
  • Western Hero Bounty Hunter Riding
  • Western Hero Bounty Hunter with Pistol
  • Western Hero Bounty Hunter with Sawed Off Shotgun.
  • Western Hero Bounty Hunter
  • Western Hero with Brown Jacket and pistol
  • Western Hero with Brown Jacket and Rifle
  • Western Hero with Brown Jacket at Ease
  • Western Hero with Brown Jacket Dead
  • Western Hero with Brown Jacket Fighting
  • Western Hero with Brown Jacket Riding
  • Western Hero with Chaps Dead
  • Western Hero with Chaps Fighting
  • Western Hero with Chaps firing Pistol
  • Western Hero with Chaps Firing Rifle
  • Western Hero with Chaps Riding
  • Western Hero with Chaps Standing
  • Western Hero with Furlined Coat and Pistol
  • Western Hero with Furlined Coat and Rifle
  • Western Hero with Furlined Coat Down
  • Western Hero with Furlined Coat Dukes Up
  • Western Hero with Furlined Coat Riding
  • Western Hero with Furlined Coat Standing
  • Western Sheriff Down

  • Western Sheriff Standing with Hat Back
  • Western Sheriff Standing
  • Western Sheriff with Pistol Hat Back
  • Western Sheriff with Pistol
  • Western Sheriff with Rifle Hat Back
  • Western Sheriff with Rifle

Requires: An active subscription or a Fantasy Grounds full or ultimate license and any Ruleset.

Created by Riley D. Owens (aka Darkwoulfe), this product consists of 57 top-down uniquely designed, 3d rendered tokens, depicting heroes, villains and monsters. You can use these to replace the letter tokens or built-in tokens in many popular adventure modules. pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP, Vista, 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows XP, Vista, 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
